story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Implementation Review (IR) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Verification
**Purpose:** Review AI implementations for vulnerabilities

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic security-focused code review for AI components.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Code review practice includes security
  - Hardcoded secrets check
  - Input validation verification
  - Error handling review
  - Logging review

- [ ] Review triggers defined
  - PRs with AI components
  - Security-sensitive changes
  - Pre-production deployment
  - Post-incident review

- [ ] Common issues checklist created
  - Prompt injection vulnerabilities
  - Sensitive data exposure
  - Improper error messages
  - Missing input validation
  - Hardcoded credentials

- [ ] Review documentation established
  - Issues found recorded
  - Remediation tracked
  - Sign-off documented
  - Lessons learned captured

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Checklist integrated into PR template
- [ ] Team trained on AI security issues
- [ ] First security-focused review completed

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- LLM01: Prompt Injection
- LLM05: Improper Output Handling
- LLM07: System Prompt Leakage
- ASI05: Unexpected Code Execution

## Resources

- [IR Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/IR-Software-OnePager.md)
- [Security Review Gate Checklist](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/templates/checklists/security-review-gate-checklist.md)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-review` for AI-assisted code review.
